title: Ebro In The Morning - Respect to J Dilla & Big Pun + Yes King Yes + The NFL Pro Bowl
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 2/7/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez, and the crew are in the studio talking about Fat Joe and Remy Ma becoming the new Regis and Kelly, Lamar Odom and Kanye acting up, and the crew shows respect to J Dilla and Big Pun.

Get excited for our new segment Yes King Yes and the also the gurus help solve your problems. All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Click here to learn about the Hot 97 - Securing the Future initiative. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
